fields.label: Approved License
fields.guidelines: These are business-friendly open licenses that generally only require attribution.  Some of these licenses also require change logs and documentation of any modifications. Refer to the specific license requirements for details.

fields.label: Approved Component
fields.guidelines: These components are approved for general usage, because they have business-friendly open licenses that generally only require attribution.  Some of these licenses also require change logs and documentation of any modifications. Refer to the specific license requirements for details.
